name: Server City
description:
Server City is the story of one little antivirus’s quest for pie. The player’s role in this is to guide the adventurer through the dangerous areas of an old infected server and get the reward at the end of it all. 

***Controls***

  1. Space to Jump
  2. F or J to Shoot
  3. WASD or Arrows to Move
  4. P to Pause

*Capstone Project

*Special thanks to those who provided assets for this project
